Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial open-ended intent to gather clues without any specific hypothesis
Broad descriptive collection of natural elements
Broad descriptive collection of man-made object clues
Divergent hypothesis generation of multiple possible mountain regions
Shallow listing of multiple specific Alpine subregions without verification

Depth-First.Explanation: Verifying and narrowing down hypotheses by identifying European road infrastructure
Depth-First.KeyElement: Road markings and reflector post indicating Europe

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent analysis combining multiple clues to confirm the European Alps hypothesis
Depth-First.KeyElement: Forest composition and topography pointing to the Alps

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused convergence on Germanic Alpine location, naming Oberammergau
Depth-First.KeyElement: Road style and infrastructure leaning toward Austria/Germany

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Moved from listing broad region hypotheses to verifying specific regional indicators
After confirming the Alps, returned to exploring multiple Alpine subregions
Shifted from listing subregions to convergent selection of a Germanic Alpine location
